name: (Spanish) Verify that the FEMA Twitter feed is present on the Spanish homepage
id: stories/fullRegression/regressionChecklistSpanish.story;(Spanish) Verify that the FEMA Twitter feed is present on the Spanish homepage

testSteps.description: When I am on the Spanish News Feeds landing page node
When I am viewing the FEMA Twitter feed
Then the most recent tweets should be displayed

userStory.narrative:
In order to assert that the basic functionality of https://www.disasterassistance.gov/es/ is working
As a tester
I want to run the daily regressions at least twice a day
